name: Outsoft
description:
Outsoft Corporation is a software development service provider offering on-demand IT talent in all of the latest technology stacks.Outsoft’s software developers combine their technical skills with expertise in IoT, Cloud, Big Data, eCommerce, Entertainment and other industry verticals catering to the most demanding customers.
Outsoft helps customers develop best software with much fewer resources by extending their in-house software development teams via dedicated offshore resources. 
Strongest expertise:
1) Web, Desktop and Mobile app development
2) VR and AR solutions
3) UI, UX Design, branding and go-to-market strategies
http://outsoft.com/outsoft.pdf
